creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: small globular shaped ewer (a) on four cloven feet; flared handle on one side and short narrow diagonal spout on opposite side; cylindrical opening at top center with cylindrical shaped lid (b); half blue and half peach with a painted design of green vegetation; black lines and grid
medium: Majolica in terracotta, thrown, altered and hand-built sections
signed: brushdrawn in white on bottom: Posey
title: Ewer
